from: Axis Bank Burgundy Private & Magnus (Burgundy) Credit Cards

partners.insight: Premium Burgundy cardholders enjoy the best conversion rate across all Axis Bank transfer partners.

from: Axis Bank Reserve & Magnus Credit Cards

partners.insight: High-end Reserve and Magnus cardholders receive an elevated 2-for-5 transfer ratio to any partner.
Horizon cardholders enjoy a simple one-to-one conversion to any partner program.

from: IndianOil Axis Bank Premium Credit Card

Marriott conversions from Atlas cards follow a reduced ratio compared with other partners.
